description: Welcome to Balmoral Place in the heart of Port Moody! This functional 3bed, 2bath home features an open kitchen with a dedicated eating area that flows to a private patio and fenced backyard, perfect for entertaining. Each bedroom is set on its own level, offering ideal privacy. The cozy living room includes a corner fireplace for relaxing evenings alone or together. Enjoy ample storage with a full laundry room, large crawlspace, and exterior storage locker. Unbeatable location: minutes to Newport Village, Suter Brook, SkyTrain, Rocky Point Park, Brewers Row, trails, restaurants, Rec Centre, library, and Eagle Ridge Hospital. A great opportunity in an incredible walking community. Bonus: Potential future development opportunities.
